name: SysmonEnte Usage
description: Detects the use of SysmonEnte, a tool to attack the integrity of Sysmon
query: (((winlog.event_data.TargetImage:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Mm][Oo][Nn]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:/0[Xx]1400/) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\.*/)) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Pp][Ll][Aa][Tt][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Mm][Pp][Ee][Nn][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))) OR winlog.event_data.CallTrace:/[Ee][Nn][Tt][Ee]/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((winlog.event_data.TargetImage:C\:\\Windows\\Sysmon64.exe AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:0x1400) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(C\:\\Program\ Files* OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\*)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* AND process.executable:*\\MsMpEng.exe)))) OR winlog.event_data.CallTrace:Ente)`
